page.title: 09A SATURDAY IN HIGHTOWN
page.content: On some Saturdays, I have a{lie in. Sometimes I go riding and then I have to get up early. When I go riding I ride 'Berwin', he is very stubborn so I have to be very firm with him! Mum sometimes takes Sam and I swimming. If mum is working, Nichola, our{babysitter}takes us. Dad normally goes to Sainsbury's on Saturdays. I get my pocket-money on Saturdays. If I have missed out a week I get two pounds. If I get a{pound coin}I put it in a bottle for presents. On some weekends Angela or Jodie, my school friends, come to sleep the night. When they come we have{midnight {feasts.
